markdown: <::A close-up photograph of a refrigeration unit component, likely an evaporator coil, heavily covered in white frost or ice. A copper pipe with a solenoid valve attached is visible, also partially covered in frost. A blue fan grille is visible on the right side of the image. The unit is housed within a metal frame. : photo::> Figuur 1

De SMIDO-me-thodiek <::transcription of the content : flowchart::> ## Aanvalsplan **Start:** - Storing - Melding **Informeren (Inform) Section:** - **Decision:** melding compleet? (report complete?) - **If 'nee' (no):** informatie verzamelen (gather information) -> returns to "melding compleet?" - **If 'ja' (yes):** - **Decision:** technisch? (technical?) - **If 'nee' (no):** - **Decision:** installatie vertrouwd? (installation familiar?) - **If 'nee' (no):** informatie verzamelen (gather information) -> returns to "installatie vertrouwd?" - **If 'ja' (yes):** -> proceeds to "1 van de 3 P's?" in Diagnose section - **If 'ja' (yes):** -> proceeds to "1 van de 3 P's?" in Diagnose section - **External Process:** buiten installatie (outside installation) -> returns to "melding compleet?" **Diagnose (Diagnosis) Section:** - **Decision:** 1 van de 3 P's? (1 of the 3 P's?) - **If 'ja' (yes):** - **Decision:** proces instelling? (process setting?) - **If 'nee' (no):** ketens uitsluiten (exclude chains) -> returns to "proces instelling?" - **If 'ja' (yes):** -> proceeds to "Oplossen" - **If 'nee' (no):** - **Decision:** 1 keten? (1 chain?) - **If 'nee' (no):** ketens uitsluiten (exclude chains) -> returns to "1 keten?" - **If 'ja' (yes):** - **Decision:** 1 onderdeel? (1 component?) - **If 'nee' (no):** onderdelen uitsluiten (exclude components) -> returns to "1 onderdeel?" - **If 'ja' (yes):** -> proceeds to "Oplossen" **End:** - Oplossen (Solve) **Logo:** ROVC Technisch de beste opleider Figuur 2 SMIDO-aanvalsplan gestructureerd storingzoeken <::>

<::A diagram showing a balance scale with a gauge on top. The gauge has a needle pointing to the 'Bandbreedte' (Bandwidth) section, which is yellow, between 'Ondergrens' (Lower limit) in red and 'Bovengrens' (Upper limit) in black. The left pan of the balance lists 'EXPANSIEORGAAN', 'VERDAMPER', 'COMPRESSOR', 'CONDENSOR', and 'Etcetera'. The right pan lists 'Koudemiddel hoeveelheid', 'Koellast product', 'Motorvermogen en verd/cond. temp', 'Hoeveelheid lucht/water', 'Omgevingstemperatuur', and 'Etcetera'. In the center, bidirectional arrows labeled 'Onderlinge relatie' (Interrelationship) connect the two lists. : diagram::> Figuur 3 In balans

ROVC Technisch de beste opleider option Start: [x] option Koelen: [ ] option Vriezen: [ ] option Koelen met diagram: [ ] option Warmtebelasting neemt toe: [ ] option Warmtebelasting te hoog: [ ] option Oververhitting te klein: [ ] option Oververhitting te hoog: [ ] option Te lage condensordruk: [ ] Π 00 <::koeltechniek Diagram of a refrigeration cycle showing a compressor, condenser, expansion valve, and evaporator. The cycle starts from the compressor (right side), where refrigerant flows through red pipes to the condenser (top right) with fans. From the condenser, the refrigerant flows through an expansion valve (left side) and then to the evaporator (bottom left) with fans, indicated by blue pipes. The refrigerant then returns to the compressor. Numbered points indicate states in the cycle: 1: -5°C, 1.4 bar 2: -5°C, 1.4 bar 3: 0°C, 1.4 bar, with an additional label 5°C, R134a 4: 55°C, 9 bar 5: 40°C, 9 bar 6: 35°C, 9 bar : diagram::>

<::A modern, sleek white and blue train with yellow accents is parked at a station platform. The train is seen from the front-left, extending into the background. The station features a large, arched glass and steel roof structure, allowing natural light to illuminate the platform. In the background, a sign indicates "10" for the platform number, with "Richting Schiphol" (Direction Schiphol) also visible. A building with orange-brown facades is visible through the glass roof in the distance. The platform is clean and modern. Figuur 1 Airco in trein::>

<::flowchart Description: A flowchart showing three blue rounded rectangles connected by right-pointing arrows. - The first rectangle contains the text: "Verschijnselen (locatie in de installatie)" - An arrow points from the first to the second rectangle. - The second rectangle contains the text: "Mogelijke oorzaken 1. 2. 3." - An arrow points from the second to the third rectangle. - The third rectangle contains the text: "Oplossingen (wat ga je controleren)" Figuur 5 Opbouw storingstabel : flowchart::>

<::A hand holds a black smartphone displaying the 'FittersApp'. The app shows a diagram of a refrigeration or HVAC system with blue and red lines representing different circuits, connected to various components like coils, valves, and a compressor. The top bar of the app shows 'FittersApp', an information icon, a globe icon, and a message icon, along with the time '08:09' and network/battery indicators. Below the app title, there's text 'Tap area of interest'. In the top left corner of the overall image, a red square logo with a white snowflake and target symbol, and the word 'Danfoss' in white script, is visible. : diagram::> Figuur 7 Danfoss App Trouble Shooter

<::A white, rectangular mobile cold storage unit with a door on one end. The unit has a blue circular logo on its side and on the door, which reads "Coolworld" in the center, and "VERHUUR", "RENTAL", "VERMIETUNG", "LOCATION" around the perimeter. A vent is visible on the left side of the unit. The unit is shown against a white background with a reflection beneath it. Figure 1. Coolworld mobile cold storage unit.::>

<::diagram: A 2D graph with a vertical axis labeled 'p' and a horizontal axis labeled 'h'. A closed, bell-shaped curve, characteristic of a vapor dome or phase envelope, is plotted within the first quadrant, starting from the origin, curving upwards and to the right, then downwards and to the left, and finally connecting back to the horizontal axis. The curve encloses an area.::> Figuur 2 Basisindeling diagram
